title.narrative: Secondary School Bursaries for Girls in Malawi

description.narrative: This project forms part of DFID Malawi\'s \'Keeping Girls in School\' programme. It is providing bursary support for 15,000 poor and vulnerable girls studying in partner schools in 17 marginalised rural districts to complete four years of secondary school. The project will simultaneously strengthen capacity within schools to manage the bursary scheme, facilitate coordination and support to schools by district level authorities and encourage the adoption of best practice by the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology, with regards to keeping girls in school.;
